title: brhannAyaki nannu
sahitya:
brhannAyaki nannu brOva vEgamE


anupallavi

  brhadAmbA nI mahimalu brahmAdi surulacE pogaDa taramA


caraNam 1    dEvI nIvE gatiyani ambA drDha bhaktitO pUjincEgadA nAveta 
dIrcavE karuNajUDa samayamidE nI pAdamE gatiyanucu neranammiti
    caraNam 2    dInarakSaki nIvani sadA dalacina dAsuDu nEnu gadA mAkabhaya 
dAnamIyavE kAmita dAyikE nI nAmamE anudinamu maravakanu
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa pAlini gauri su-lalitE shyAmaLE nAtO vAdA mAyammA
I mahilO nI samAna deivamosagu I vELanu duramuganu varamosagu
